business_details.Business: The accused is sentenced to undergo rigorous imprisonment for 4 (four) years and also pay fine of Rs.5000/- in default R.I. for 2 month under section 354B IPC.The accused is further sentenced to go R.I. for  2 years and also pay fine of Rs.3000/- in default rigorous imprisonment for 1 month under section 12 of POCSO Act.
